page.title: 04LAKESIDE IN WEST THURROCK
page.content: Lakeside is a trading estate that is being developed in the reclaimed chalk quarries beside the Dartford Tunnel approach road.It has easy access to the M25 orbital motorway around London and hence to the rest of the country. It is hoped to develop the area around the existing lake in three parts _ retail and warehousing units,a shopping and leisure centre,light industry and commercial distributors. One large superstore,Tesco,opened in Autumn 1984 with a 100 000 sq.ft. building and car parking for 1100 cars.Beside it there is a large tower that flashes the time and air temperature alternately.
